system.description: Restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one or more of the subject's ability scores and restores all such scores to normal. It also eliminates fatigue and exhaustion, and removes negative levels. It does not restore permanent level drain or restore Constitution points lost to death. For one negative level, it costs 100 gp in material components; for each additional negative level, 500 gp.

components.materialDescription: Diamond dust worth 100 gp (for one negative level) or 500 gp per additional negative level.
